text: Stillwater is an upcoming American crime drama film directed by Tom McCarthy. It stars Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin. ==Premise== A father works to exonerate his estranged daughter of a murder she never committed. ==Cast== *Matt Damon as Bill Baker *Abigail Breslin as Allison Baker *Camille Cottin as Virginie *Deanna Dunagan as Sharon ==Production== It was announced in July 2019 that Tom McCarthy would write and direct the film, with Matt Damon set to star. Abigail Breslin was added to the cast later in the month, with filming beginning in August.Matt Damon To Star In ‘Stillwater’ Film With Tom McCarthy Attached To DirectAbigail Breslin Joins Matt Damon in ‘Stillwater’ (EXCLUSIVE)Participant Media Ups Jeannine Tang To General Counsel Camille Cottin had been added to the cast in September.Tom McCarthy's Untitled Thriller Starring Matt Damon Sets Fall 2020 Release Mychael Danna composed the film's score. ==Release== The film was scheduled to be released on November 6, 2020.Matt Damon’s Untitled Thriller Set for 2020 Awards Season Release However, it was pulled from the schedule. ==References== ==External links== *Stillwater at the Internet Movie Database Category:Upcoming films Category:American drama films Category:Films shot in Oklahoma Category:Films directed by Tom McCarthy Category:Films scored by Mychael Danna Category:American films Category:Focus Features films Category:Universal Pictures films
title: Stillwater (film)
